Text:
It's a game set in post-apocalyptic Costa Rica.  You drive a combination rototiller/pavement grader ? GTA 4 style ? in a race to the top of your profession ? BY ANY BLOODY MEANS POSSIBLE!

It's high stakes, high action pavement grading, roto-tilling madness on the streets of LA in...

PURE Vida Klipp - Part Uno
Till 'til You Drop & Grade to tha Grave!

---  Shite Gamer - January 2010

Find, Part Dos - 14GBs of Continued Madness from TacoDrone, here:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5384122/Pura_Vida_klipp_2

----

Now that I think about it, don't download either of these.  What the hell is it?

Really? Wow, this game sounds awesome! I can't wait! Seed!!! I am on the edge of my keyboard with anticipation! 

LOL!!
